claim: The Homesman features music by Marco Beltrami.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Marco Edward Beltrami  (  born October 7 , 1966  )  is an American film and television composer , best known for his work scoring horror films such as Mimic  (  1997  )  , The Faculty  (  1998  )  , Resident Evil  (  2002  )  , Do n't Be Afraid of the Dark  (  2011  )  and The Woman in Black  (  2012  )  .

claim: The Homesman features music by Marco Beltrami.
premise_source_doc_sentence: A long-time friend and collaborator of Wes Craven , Beltrami has scored seven of the director 's films including all four films in the Scream franchise  (  1996 -- 2011  )  .

claim: The Homesman features music by Marco Beltrami.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Beltrami has been nominated for two Academy Awards for 3:10 to Yuma and The Hurt Locker , and won a Satellite Award for Best Original Score for Soul Surfer  (  2011  )  .

claim: The Homesman features music by Marco Beltrami.
premise_source_doc_sentence: He also scored Guillermo del Toro 's 2004 supernatural superhero film Hellboy , the 2013 superhero film The Wolverine and its sequel Logan .

claim: The Homesman features music by Marco Beltrami.
premise_source_doc_sentence: This edition featured as guests the film music composers Marco Beltrami , David Arnold and Alfonso de Vilallonga .
